textAfterTable: Apartment Features Cable Ready. Air Conditioning: Wall Units. Utilities: Water & Trash Pickup. A/C Available Carpeting Gas Heat Custom Window Coverings Ceiling Fan(s) Dining Room Dining Area Large Closets Balcony Patio Kitchen Dishwasher Separate Kitchen Gas Range Bathroom Rain Showerhead Deep-soaking Tub Building Features & Amenities Walk-up Laundry in Building On-site Garage Sundeck Courtyard/Plaza Landscaped Grounds Assigned Parking Space Covered Parking On-site Maintenance Units: 82 Low-rise (1-6 Floors) Rental Property Pet policy: Dogs OK, Cats OK   Neighborhood / Parking / Transportation This community is located in the charming upper village of Croton-on-Hudson. Close to Metro North and Beeline Bus and within walking distance to shops, restaurants and night life. Enjoy the majestic Hudson River with Yacht clubs, boating sports, kayaking and festivals. Only minutes to TeaTown Lake Reservation, Nature Center, Croton Dam and historic landmarks. All this and we are only a 45 minute drive to New York City! Commuter Bus Nearby Walking Distance to: Restaurants Shopping Nightlife/Entertainment
